Articles.Content:
I've decided to start a mission log, keeping track of the various missions I undertake in Kerbal Space Program.

Admittedly, this is my first log and expect to see a lot of entries involving failed landing gear, parachutes being torn off, strandings in space, and the like.

I will be identifying my missions by

[Planet]:[Moon]-xx[A-Z]

For example Eve-01A

or

Jool:Laythe-01C

I will be adding entries for planets chronologically, so my first mission will be to Eve, then for example I go to Minmus, then Jool, etc. So the entries listed will be as follows: Eve, Kerbin, Jool

I'll add spoilers for different planets as I explore them.

Eve-01A

-POSTPONED-

Kerbin:Minmus-01A

Details are TBA

Edited September 26, 2012 by Sherlock21st
